Title: 2027: Tinubu enjoys majority support despite dissenting voices — Dogara
Summary: Former Speaker of the House of Representatives, Yakubu Dogara, has expressed support for President Bola Tinubu . Dogara said the establishment of the Forum of Former Members of the Legislature, which he attended, was meant to harness the experience and training acquired by legislators during their service .

Title: Police rescue three abducted victims in Gombe, recover AK-47 rifles
Summary: The Gombe State Police Command has rescued three abducted victims and recovered two AK-47 rifles following an attack by suspected bandits in Pindiga District of Akko Local Government Area of the state . Police said three of the suspected bandits were neutralised during the gun duel, while others escaped into the forest with suspected gunshot injuries .

Title: We’re increasing intelligence, equipment support for Nigeria — US military
Summary: The US military is increasing materiel deliveries and intelligence sharing with Nigeria as part of a push to work with African militaries to go after Islamic State linked militants . The increased cooperation with Abuja follows Washington’s diplomatic pressure on Nigeria over jihadist violence in the country . Title: Ex-minister Alison-Madueke's corruption trial to begin in London
Summary: Diezani Alison-Madueke is accused of accepting ‘financial or other advantages’ from individuals linked to two energy groups between 2011 and 2015 . The 65-year-old faces five counts of accepting bribes and one count of conspiracy to commit bribery, all related to her time as Nigeria’s Minister for Petroleum Resources

Title: Three suspected bandits killed in Gombe border communities
Summary: The Gombe State Police Command on Sunday confirmed the neutralisation of three suspected bandits, the recovery of arms and ammunition, and the rescue of kidnapped victims following coordinated security operations across border communities in the state . Security forces had earlier thwarted an attempted attack by bandits on Friday due to heavy deployment across vulnerable areas .
